title: How to Get Engrams Fast in Destiny

steps.headline: Get to level 8 at least, so that you can do the strike on Earth.
steps.description: It is fairly easy to get to level 8, and you do not need a lot of stuff to do that.

steps.headline: Do the strike.
steps.description: Then redo it and redo it. This might sound boring, but there is no other really good way to get engrams.

steps.headline: Do unlocked strikes.
steps.description: When you get to higher levels, and more strikes are unlocked, then do them. And redo them often.

steps.headline: Once you gain access to the Vanguard strikes, do those instead of the usual ones.
steps.description: That way, you will get better results and better engrams.

steps.headline: Check the Crucible.
steps.description: Once you are level 5, the Crucible can be a very good source of engrams. You just have to get good, because it is hard at first.

steps.headline: Try regular missions on hard difficulty.
steps.description: This is another great way to get engrams. They are harder, get you better stuff, and are more fun than constantly repeating strikes or Crucible missions.

steps.headline: Do the daily and weekly challenges.
steps.description: These are yet another way to get engrams. They are like super-hard versions of the missions.

steps.headline: Do a mission at a much higher level than you are.
steps.description: This is very profitable when you have high-level friends to back you up.

steps.headline: Do raids.
steps.description: These are also a good equipment getter, but cannot be accessed until you are at a very high level.

steps.headline: Try bounties.
steps.description: You can get you good money for buying engrams yourself.

text: Strike Missions Get to level 8 at least, so that you can do the strike on Earth. It is fairly easy to get to level 8, and you do not need a lot of stuff to do that. Do the strike. Then redo it and redo it. This might sound boring, but there is no other really good way to get engrams. Do unlocked strikes. When you get to higher levels, and more strikes are unlocked, then do them. And redo them often. Once you gain access to the Vanguard strikes, do those instead of the usual ones. That way, you will get better results and better engrams. Other Missions Check the Crucible. Once you are level 5, the Crucible can be a very good source of engrams. You just have to get good, because it is hard at first. Try regular missions on hard difficulty. This is another great way to get engrams. They are harder, get you better stuff, and are more fun than constantly repeating strikes or Crucible missions. Do the daily and weekly challenges. These are yet another way to get engrams. They are like super-hard versions of the missions. Do a mission at a much higher level than you are. This is very profitable when you have high-level friends to back you up. Do raids. These are also a good equipment getter, but cannot be accessed until you are at a very high level. Try bounties. You can get you good money for buying engrams yourself.
